title: The Adventures of Mark Twain
cast: James Whitmore, Michele Mariana, Gary Krug, Chris Ritchie
plot: Tom Sawyer, Becky Thatcher and Huck Finn join Mark Twain on his airship to meet Halley's Comet.

title: Beanstalk
cast: J.D. Daniels, Amy Stoch, Patrick Renna, Richard Moll
plot: A young boy finds a crate of green beans. When they're planted, they grow a beanstalk to the clouds, where a castle of giants are habited.

title: Zarkorr! The Invader
cast: Franklin A. Vallette, Don Yanan, Peter Looney, Dyer McHenry
plot: An "average" postal worker is informed by a tiny alien hologram which looks like a teenage girl that he is the "choosen one" to destroy a giant reptile to save the Earth.

title: Rock 'n' Roll Frankenstein
writer: Brian O'Hara (story), Vito Cannella (story), John Klann (story), Brian O'Hara (screenplay)
cast: Graig Guggenheim, Jayson Spence, Barry Feterman, Hiram Jacob Segarra
plot: Music agent Bernie Stein, his scientist nephew Frankie, and a drugged out roadie named Iggy team to create a superstar by putting together the remains of dead rockers. All goes according to...

title: Foodfight!
writer: Lawrence Kasanoff (story), Joshua Wexler (story), Brent V. Friedman, Rebecca Swanson, Sean Catherine Derek
cast: Charlie Sheen, Hilary Duff, Eva Longoria, Wayne Brady
plot: The evil Brand X joins a supermarket that becomes a city after closing time.

title: Jurassic World
writer: Rick Jaffa (screenplay), Amanda Silver (screenplay), Colin Trevorrow (screenplay), Derek Connolly (screenplay), Rick Jaffa (story), Amanda Silver (story), Michael Crichton (characters)
cast: Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard, Irrfan Khan, Vincent D'Onofrio
plot: A new theme park is built on the original site of Jurassic Park. Everything is going well until the park's newest attraction--a genetically modified giant stealth killing machine--escapes containment and goes on a killing spree.

title: States of Grace
cast: Ignacio Serricchio, Lucas Fleischer, Lamont Stephens, Rachel Emmers
plot: The lives of a street preacher, an aspiring actress, a Mormon missionary, and a young gang banger intersect in this ensemble drama set in present-day Santa Monica, California.

title: The Stanford Prison Experiment
cast: Billy Crudup, Michael Angarano, Moises Arias, Nicholas Braun
plot: Twenty-four male students out of seventy-five were selected to take on randomly assigned roles of prisoners and guards in a mock prison situated in the basement of the Stanford psychology building.

cast: Chadwick Boseman, Harrison Ford, Nicole Beharie, Christopher Meloni
plot: The story of Jackie Robinson from his signing with the Brooklyn Dodgers organization in 1945 to his historic 1947 rookie season when he broke the color barrier in Major League Baseball.

title: The Equalizer
writer: Richard Wenk, Michael Sloan (television series), Richard Lindheim (television series)
cast: Denzel Washington, Marton Csokas, ChloÃ« Grace Moretz, David Harbour
plot: A man believes he has put his mysterious past behind him and has dedicated himself to beginning a new, quiet life. But when he meets a young girl under the control of ultra-violent Russian gangsters, he can't stand idly by - he has to help her.

title: Sin City: A Dame to Kill For
cast: Mickey Rourke, Jessica Alba, Josh Brolin, Joseph Gordon-Levitt
plot: Some of Sin City's most hard-boiled citizens cross paths with a few of its more reviled inhabitants.

title: Ant-Man
writer: Edgar Wright (screenplay), Joe Cornish (screenplay), Adam McKay (screenplay), Paul Rudd (screenplay), Edgar Wright (story), Joe Cornish (story), Stan Lee (comic book), Larry Lieber (comic book), Jack Kirby (comic book)
cast: Paul Rudd, Michael Douglas, Evangeline Lilly, Corey Stoll
plot: Armed with a super-suit with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, cat burglar Scott Lang must embrace his inner hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, plan and pull off a heist that will save the world.
awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 7 nominations.

title: Cool Air
cast: Morgan Weisser, Crystal Laws Green, Jenny Dare Paulin, Norbert Weisser
plot: Charlie Baxter, a struggling screenwriter, is searching for accommodation in a rundown mansion somewhere in the isolated mountains above Malibu. An expressionless and creatively bankrupt ...

title: R.I.P.D.
writer: Phil Hay (screenplay), Matt Manfredi (screenplay), David Dobkin (story), Phil Hay (story), Matt Manfredi (story), Peter M. Lenkov (Dark Horse comic)
cast: Jeff Bridges, Ryan Reynolds, Kevin Bacon, Mary-Louise Parker
plot: A recently slain cop joins a team of undead police officers working for the Rest in Peace Department and tries to find the man who murdered him.

title: Scary Movie 5
cast: Ashley Tisdale, Simon Rex, Gracie Whitton, Ava Kolker
plot: A couple begin to experience some unusual activity after bringing their lost nieces and nephew home. With the help of home-surveillance cameras, they learn they're being stalked by a nefarious demon.
